-- | MonadSTM class analogous to MonadIO
--   
--   MonadSTM class analogous to MonadIO
@package monad-stm
@version 0.1.0.2

module Control.Monad.STM.Class
class MonadSTM m
liftSTM :: MonadSTM m => STM a -> m a
instance (Monad m, MonadSTM m, MonadTrans t) => MonadSTM (t m)
instance MonadSTM IO
instance MonadSTM STM
